SQL.LOAD: SELECT rule_list_id, ED.dealer_id, effective, expiration, EDRL.created_date, EDRL.created_by, EDRL.modified_date, EDRL.modified_by, dealer_rule_list_id, ED.DEALER_NAME DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_DEALER_RULE_LIST EDRL INNER JOIN ELP_DEALER ED ON EDRL.DEALER_ID = ED.DEALER_ID WHERE dealer_rule_list_id = :dealer_rule_list_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT DEALER_RULE_LIST_ID, RULE_LIST_ID, EDRL.DEALER_ID, EFFECTIVE, EXPIRATION, ED.DEALER_NAME DESCRIPTION, EDRL.created_date, EDRL.created_by, EDRL.modified_date, EDRL.modified_by FROM ELP_DEALER_RULE_LIST EDRL INNER JOIN ELP_DEALER ED ON EDRL.DEALER_ID = ED.DEALER_ID WHERE RULE_LIST_ID = :RULE_LIST_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_dealer_rule_list SET rule_list_id = :rule_list_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE dealer_rule_list_id = :dealer_rule_list_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_dealer_rule_list ( rule_list_id, dealer_id, effective, expiration, created_by, dealer_rule_list_id ) VALUES ( :rule_list_id, :dealer_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :dealer_rule_list_id )
SQL.LOAD_DEALER_LIST: SELECT DEALER_ID ID, DEALER_NAME DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_DEALER ED INNER JOIN ELP_COMPANY EC ON ED.COMPANY_ID = EC.COMPANY_ID
